name: WarFriends: PVP Shooter
description:
WarFriends is a skill-based, real-time multiplayer game with intuitive touch controls that brings you fast-paced, and action-packed PvP brawls. Collect powerful weapons, assemble an army to cover your back, and go to war against real players from across the world.


“It’s easy to understand why so many mobile gamers have been raving about WarFriends.” – Gamezebo

“The time you spend with it will be spent with a bang-bang shooty grin on your face.” – Pocket Gamer

“WarFriends features some really classy graphics that will keep you hooked to the game for hours.” – MMO Square

RAISE A CRUSHING FORCE
Recruit infantry, snipers, exo-mechs, helicopters, and tanks to create an unstoppable army. Strategically deploy your soldiers in the heat of battle to take out rivals; snipe them out one by one, or deploy a tank to deal with them – the choice is yours.

BECOME THE ARENA CHAMPION
Each week, the gates of the Arena open so you can test your skills against other players in balanced matches, regardless of rank. Experience the challenging and ever-changing arena rules, and fight online against players in skill based, quick-action matches. Become the best and collect exclusive Elite Parts that allow you to turn your army into a superior force with unmatched powers.

TEAM UP TO WIN
Enlist friends to fight alongside you in ranked PvP death matches. Battle to the top of the leaderboards for world-wide bragging rights. Plan your next attack strategy in the squad chat. Dive into the Daily Mission game mode for single-player combat rage, or a frenetic co-op play with friends or squad members, to earn extraordinary rewards.

DISCOVER INCREDIBLE FIREPOWER
Collect a full arsenal of weapons, ranging from pistols and sniper rifles, to shotguns and anti-tank bazookas, and refine your combat strategy to perfection. Master every weapon type, switch firearms as you reload, and dodge incoming bullets and grenades with simple, intuitive touch controls.
